title: Looking to Teach New Players
body:
I bounce around between mid Silver and low Gold for the past month or so. Looking to coach/teach newer players. Preferably levels 15+ but really open to anyone. Will do full on coaching sessions as well as answer any questions you have and work on improving your CS, decision making and general mechanics. Want to have 1-2 players I work very heavily with once season 5 starts.

Add me in game: GG Mezzie (name changing once the sale starts will TRY to remember to post it here).

replies.body:
I sent you a message looking for some coaching on becoming a better top lane. been playing alot but i seem to always get beat out by more aggressive top laners. 
In game name:Eating Crayons
LvL:25
